Key Match Events: Texas scored 5 early runs to help lefty earn his 1st win since July 21
Pre-Game Insights: Andrew Heaney had received two-or-fewer runs of support in seven straight starts and in 18 of his 27 starts
Post-Match Reflections: Heaney collected his first win since July 21 against the Orioles
Heaney also has a career-high 13 losses in 2024, which is tied for the second-most in MLB
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rangers have now won four straight series, prevailing over the White Sox, A's, Yankees and Angels
Texas is 10-3 since Aug. 28, marking the club's best 13-game stretch since Aug. 3-16, 2023 (also 10-3)
Others: Heaney praised the Rangers' offense for providing him with the necessary support to win
Marcus Semien said Heaney is 'pitching so much better than his record'
